name: Video Controls Skin - Hi-Vis-Light
description:
Changes the appearance of the open audio/video player controls in Firefox.

This style was created out of a personal need to have larger controls and especially to be able to see the time and duration labels.

The screen shot is of the video player zoomed out a bit to be able to capture a screen shot who's final file size would meet userstyles.org's file size maximum. It is clear and sharp especially the text-shadow effects on the time and duration labels in normal viewing size.  

Visit http://www.accessfirefox.org/Firefox-Media-Control-Skins.php for better screen shots.

Also see:

http://userstyles.org/styles/19074

http://userstyles.org/styles/19075

user.about: Get Stylish Tools for Firefox. Quicker access to several Stylish features through a toolbar button and/or keyboard shortcuts. Available for Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey. Stylish Tools provides quicker access to the following Stylish features. 1. Write New Style Access through the toolbar button or through Ctrl + Alt + U 2. Manage Styles This allows you to manage your userstyles in a tab and not through Add-ons Manager > Stylish. The difference is that It loads much quicker. Access through the toolbar button or through Ctrl + Alt + M In Thunderbird, access is only available through the toolbar button. 3.Write style for...
